import React, {Component} from 'react'; import {Modal, Button, Row, Col, Form} from 'react-bootstrap'; export class AddEmployee extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); } handleSubmit(event){ event.preventDefault(); fetch('https://localhost:44369//api/Employee/AddEmployee') // alert(event.target.FullName.value); // alert(event.target.Email.value); // alert(event.target.Password.value); // alert(event.target.Mobile.value); // alert(event.target.Address.value); } render(){ return( Add Employee
FullName Email Id Password Mobile no. Address
) } }
